Sourcetable is building an AI spreadsheet & data platform.

We came out of stealth via ShowHN last two weeks ago: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=41590682

5 of 8 on the team are ex-founders and 4 of us have previously founded an AI or ML company. Everybody is technical. We're looking for a staff level eng to join our team in SF. Previous founding-team experience strongly preferred (but not required).
